summary: The diff partially implements the requested changes. REQ-2 (header logo update) is fully implemented with the image path updated in SiteHeader.tsx. However, REQ-1 (welcome text with user's display name) is not evidenced in the diff - the Home.tsx file is mentioned in the summary as having 'personalized greeting using actual display name from session auth' but the actual code changes are not shown in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the h2 element to display 'Welcome back, [Their User]!' where [Their User] is replaced with the authenticated user's display name
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary mentions Home.tsx has a 'personalized greeting using actual display name from session auth' but the actual implementation code is not visible in the truncated diff. Cannot verify the h2 element was updated with the specific format 'Welcome back, [Their User]!' or that the fallback for unauthenticated users was implemented.
